text: Altron is a Japanese video game developer and publisher founded in 1983. It has developed or published games for the Nintendo 64, PlayStation, Sega Saturn, Super Nintendo, Sega Mega Drive, Nintendo Entertainment System, Nintendo DS, Game Boy and Game Boy Color video game systems as well as for the PC. == Games == Year Title Platforms JP NA EU AU 1984 Paperboy DOS, Game Boy 1986 Super Sprint Atari ST, NES 1989 The Chessmaster Game Boy, SNES 1991 The Hunt for Red October Game Boy The Untouchables NES Home Alone Game Boy, SNES https://ia800604.us.archive.org/view_archive.php?archive=/1/items/World_of_Spectrum_June_2017_Mirror/World%20of%20Spectrum%20June%202017%20Mirror.zip&file;=World%20of%20Spectrum%20June%202017%20Mirror/sinclair/magazines/ACE/Issue53/Pages/ACE5300083.jpg Tom & Jerry NES, DOS 1992 Attack of the Killer Tomatoes Game Boy Redline: F1 Racer SNES Tom & Jerry Game Boy, Game Boy Color 1993 Lingo: 5 mal 5 Game Boy Little Magic SNES, Game Boy Color Pink Goes to Hollywood SNES http://download.abandonware.org/magazines/Player%20One/playerone_numero041/Player%20One%20n%B041%20(Avril%201994)%20-%20Page%20106.jpg Tom and Jerry: Frantic Antics!
